cards.name: Xifang Hu, Light Within
cards.text:
Transcend (Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)
When Xifang Hu enters, noncreature spells cost {2} more to cast until your next turn.
{1}{W}: Demigod — Whenever a creature attacks this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
{4}{W}{W}: God — Distribute a flying, first strike, indestructible, lifelink, vigilance, and +1/+1 counter among any number of creatures you control.

cards.name: Xijiang, the Fiend Judge
cards.text:
Transcend (Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)
Trample
{2}{R}: Demigod — Create a 2/1 black Spirit creature token with “This creature can't block.”
{5}{R}: God — Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste and “When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.”

cards.name: Xiong Mao, the Enduring
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red Panda Monk creature token with “{T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.”
[0]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card and a land card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
[-2]: Xiong Mao deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the greatest power among creatures you control and cards in your graveyard.
[-7]: Any number of players' life totals each become equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

cards.flavor: “Gold-tipped are my arrows, such that if they were to reach the Heavens, the Winds may smile upon me for my tribute.”
cards.name: Yangzhi Cloudpiercer
cards.text:
Reach
{T}: Yangzhi Cloudpiercer deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.name: Ye Feng, Lotus Apothecary
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Return target creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Yi Cang, Thief of Blessings
cards.text:
Yi Cang, Thief of Blessings enters with a +1/+1 counter on them.
{1}: Yi Cang becomes a copy of target creature in their pack, except their name is Yi Cang, Thief of Blessings, they're legendary in addition to their other types, and they have this ability. (Two or more creatures you control with equal power are in a pack.)

cards.name: Zhizhu Jing, Duality of Fates
cards.text:
Transcend (Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)
Menace
{2}{B}: Demigod — Surveil 2. Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
{4}{B}:  God — Search your library for two cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses one. Put the chosen card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

cards.name: Zhu Bajie, Shepherd of Stone
cards.text:
Transcend (Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
{1}{R}{G}: Demigod — Whenever a land you control enters this turn, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.
{6}{R}{G}: God — Until end of turn, lands you control become 3/3 Spirit creatures with indestructible and haste that are still lands. Untap them.

cards.name: Zhu Bajie's Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Target creature you control fights another target creature.
• Exile target artifact.
• Destroy target land. Its controller creates a tapped colorless land token named Lotus Spring with “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
• Target player returns a land card from their graveyard to their hand.

changes: 2023-08-01 — Now costs {4}{R}{R} (from {4}{R}) and now perennially triggers "Once during each of your turns."
cards.name: Zhu Long, Refulgent Wind
cards.text:
Flying
When Zhu Long enters, if {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} was spent to cast it, untap up to five target lands.
Once during each of your turns, when you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if no more than one mana of each color was spent to cast it, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
